articles.author: Ashish Singh
articles.title: Meta Isn't Using Private Posts Date To Train Its New 'Meta AI' Assistant; Here's What It Said About User Privacy - Jagran English
articles.description: According to Metas President of Global Affairs Nick Clegg the parent company of Facebook and Instagram removed private posts and chats from training its Meta AI virtual assistant to safeguard user privacy Contrasting with current complaints of tech monopolies…
articles.content: Meta, the parent company of Facebook and Instagram, announced that it omitted private posts and chats from its training data for the newly released Meta AI virtual assistant in order to prioritise us… [+2218 chars]
